mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.board_title AS boardTitle, b.board_created_at AS boardCreateAt, e.employee_name AS employeeName FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.employee_id ORDER BY b.board_created_at DESC

SELECT b.board_title AS boardTitle, b.board_content AS boardContent, b.board_created_at AS boardCreateAt, e.employee_name AS employeeName FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId}
SELECT bf.file_name AS name, bf.file_url AS url, bf.file_size AS size FROM board_file bf WHERE bf.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY bf.board_file_id ASC
